Ability.Description: Deals 1533 Life damage over 16s. Increases the Mage's Dodge chance by 10%.

Rank.Description: Blade buffs and Lightning Charge increase your Mana Regeneration rate by 2% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 1%.
Blade buffs and Lightning Charge increase your Mana Regeneration rate by 4% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 2%.
Blade buffs and Lightning Charge increase your Mana Regeneration rate by 6% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 3%.
Blade buffs and Lightning Charge increase your Mana Regeneration rate by 8% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 4%.
Blade buffs and Lightning Charge increase your Mana Regeneration rate by 10% and increase the damage of your Slashing attacks by 5%.
Increases the damage bonus Piercing Beam gives to your Slashing attacks by 2%.
Increases the damage bonus Piercing Beam gives to your Slashing attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage bonus Piercing Beam gives to your Slashing attacks by 6%.

Ability.Description: Deals 536 to 593 Life damage. Increases the damage slashing attacks deal to the enemy by 5% for 30s. Counts as a Slashing attack.

Rank.Description: Reduces the cast time of your Vorpal Slash by 50%.
Reduces the cast time of your Vorpal Slash by 100%.
When you Dodge an attack, you have a 50% chance to deal damage, based on your Spell Power, to the attacker.
When you Dodge an attack, you have a 100% chance to deal damage, based on your Spell Power, to the attacker.

Ability.Description: Teleports the Mage backwards 20 meters. Removes all crowd control effects.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage of your Lightning Blade and Reaper's Blade by 20%.
Increases the damage of your Lightning Blade and Reaper's Blade by 40%.
Allows Blade Rush to be used in combat and gives it a 50% chance to stun the enemy for up to 4 seconds.
Allows Blade Rush to be used in combat and gives it a 100% chance to stun the enemy for up to 4 seconds.
Increases the cast time reduction provided by the Eldritch Armor proc to 2.25 seconds and reduces the global cooldown of cast time abilities using the proc effect to 1 second.
Increases the cast time reduction provided by the Eldritch Armor proc to 2.5 seconds and reduces the global cooldown of cast time abilities using the proc effect to 0.5 seconds.
Your Lucent Slash will refresh your active Blazing Light on the enemy.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 50% chance to place an absorb shield on you for up to 5 seconds, absorbing up to 5% of your Maximum Health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Your successful Critical Hits have a 100% chance to place an absorb shield on you for up to 5 seconds, absorbing up to 5% of your Maximum Health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Ability.Description: Restores 203 to 225 health to the Mage. Cooldown is reset if the Mage is Critically Hit. Cannot reset more than once every 5s.
Restores 203 to 225 health to the Mage. Cooldown is reset if the Mage is Critically Hit. Cannot reset more than once every 5s.
Teleports the Mage behind up to 5 enemies, dealing 966 to 1067 Air damage to each.

Rank.Description: Gives your Conditioned Response a 10% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Gives your Conditioned Response a 20% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Gives your Conditioned Response a 30% chance to reset its cooldown when you are damaged while below 50% health. Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
Reduces the global cooldown generated by your Slashing and Ethereal attacks to 1.25 seconds and reduces their mana cost by 16%.
Reduces the global cooldown generated by your Slashing and Ethereal attacks to 1 second and reduces their mana cost by 33%.

Ability.Description: Marks the enemy for 15s. Damaging single target attacks by the Mage on another enemy, deal their damage to the marked enemy as well. Reduces the Mage's damage by 10%.

Rank.Description: Incoming damage has a 5% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Incoming damage has a 10% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Incoming damage has a 15% chance to cause you to heal for 5% of your Maximum Health. Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
In addition to its original effects, Charged Blade increases all damage by 5%.
In addition to its original effects, Charged Blade increases all damage by 10%.

Ability.Description: Summons a deadly scythe of magical energy. Slashing attacks deal an additional 53 Life damage and heals the Mage by 11. All other damaging attacks have a 30% chance to trigger this effect. Increases the Mage's damage by 10% for 15s if an enemy dies within 5s of the Mage damaging them. Lasts 1h.

Deals 2964 Air damage over 3s. Deals an additional 847 to 936 Air damage after 3s. Counts as a Slashing attack. Can move while channeling. Requires a Harbinger weapon buff.
Grants the Mage's slashing attacks a 40% chance to reduce the cast time of their next ability by 2s and mana cost by 40%. Cannot occur more than once every 3s. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.
Deals 1164 to 1287 Air damage. Must be used after the enemy Dodges, Blocks or Resists one of the Mage's attacks.
Stuns for 5s.
Deals up to 603 to 667 Life damage. Deals an additional 100% of damage done over 8s.
Deals 362 to 400 Life damage to up to 5 enemies, and an additional 254 Life damage over 3s.
Teleports the Mage backwards 20 meters. Removes all crowd control effects.
Snares the enemy, reducing their movement speed by 30% for 10s. Deals 230 Life damage each second the enemy is moving.
Reduces the damage of the next 5 incoming attacks by 5% of the Mage's Maximum Health. Lasts up to 30s.
Deals 536 to 593 Life damage. Increases the damage slashing attacks deal to the enemy by 5% for 30s. Counts as a Slashing attack.
Transforms the Mage into a powerful Elemental, reducing the damage they take by 20% and granting them additional temporary abilities. Lasts 15s.
Charges at the enemy, dealing 670 to 740 Air damage. Cannot be used in combat.
Increases the range of the Mage's single target melee range attacks to 30m for 15s.
Increases the Mage's damage by 1% for each point spent in the Harbinger soul.
Deals 670 to 740 Air damage.
Restores 203 to 225 health to the Mage. Cooldown is reset if the Mage is Critically Hit. Cannot reset more than once every 5s.
Reduces the cast time of the Mage's next ability by 2 seconds.

Summons a deadly scythe of magical energy. Slashing attacks deal an additional 53 Life damage and heals the Mage by 11. All other damaging attacks have a 30% chance to trigger this effect. Increases the Mage's damage by 10% for 15s if an enemy dies within 5s of the Mage damaging them. Lasts 1h.
Renders the Mage invisible for up to 10s. Using an ability or taking damage will break this effect.
Deals 737 to 815 Air damage. Applies a stacking debuff, increasing the Mage's damage on the enemy by 3% per stack. Max 3 stacks. Lasts 15s.
Causes damaging attacks to return 5% of the Mage's mana. Reduces the Mage's damage by 10%. Lasts 10s.
Marks the enemy for 15s. Damaging single target attacks by the Mage on another enemy, deal their damage to the marked enemy as well. Reduces the Mage's damage by 10%.
Summons a blade of electrical energy. Slashing attacks deal an additional 63 Air damage. All other damaging attacks have a 5% chance to deal an additional 63 Air damage. Lasts 1h.
Deals 1081 to 1195 Air damage. Counts as a Slashing attack.
Increases damage done by the Mage's slashing attacks by 20%. Each slashing ability consumes 5 Charge. Slashing abilities cannot generate Charge while active. Does not trigger a global cooldown.
Increases the Mage's chance to Dodge by 40%. Lasts 10s.
Summons a blade of living energy. Causes melee attacks to deal an additional 69 to 76 Life damage to up to 5 enemies. Lasts 1h.
Interrupts.
